title: Kindred Piano sheet music
body: I know you guys are working hard to make the sheet music. As someone very interested in learning it, I wondering if you had any idea on how soon it will be available. Hoping for something besides 'soon' TM :)

replies.body: This makes me cry out in Joy!!
I did say very soon hehe

I don't mean to boot Ed out of business (I have a huge amount of respect for him already) but I've completed my own transcription and if you'd like to get a jump-start on learning it while Ed polishes up the official version, here's the link!
https://www.noteflight.com/scores/view/2ec00f81535906bbc43077116e09950bb4a1269d

OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOEEEEEEEEMGAAAAAAAWD.  

Ed The Conqueror, question:  how will Riot be releasing / publishing said sheet music. will it be affiliated in any way with Riot Records? Perhaps a "Resources" wing/division? Do you plan on releasing more? When can I get the tab's for Tahm and Jinx?!?!?!?!?!?!  {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Hey Fish Master9000, please go ahead and check out the official sheet music in a separate thread at [http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/sound-music/RYMr4vFV-kindred-the-eternal-hunters-official-sheet-music](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/sound-music/RYMr4vFV-kindred-the-eternal-hunters-official-sheet-music)
Thanks. I'm super hyped to start learning. I hope you make many more great songs :)

I requested this in Riot support as well. 
Somehow we ending up talking about TSM and CLG.
